title: Favipiravir does not improve viral clearance in mild to moderate COVID-19 – A systematic review and meta-analysis of randomized controlled trials
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Muh Akbar Bahar, Ikhwan Yuda Kusuma, Ádám Visnyovszki, Mária Matuz, Ria Benkő, Tamás Ferenci, Bálint Gergely Szabó, Edit Hajdú, Zoltán Pető, Dezső Csupor
